Class LineClient

public class LineClient extends Object
Class for the Client CLI.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    chooseDeck()
    Asks the player to select an assistant cards deck Send a command to the server to select the chosen deck
    static void
    clearConsole()
    Clears the console and prints player and game information
    static void
    initSetup()
    Asks to create a new game or join an existing one
    static void
    joinGame()
    Send a command to the server to join the selected game
    static void
    login()
    Asks the player a username Send a command to the server to log in with the selected username
    static void
    newGame()
    Asks the number of player of the game and sends a message to server to start a new game.
    void
    startClient()
    Creates a new a connection socket to the server, creates a new BufferedReader and a PrinterWriter and sets them to the ClientOut and ClientInput.
    static void
    stdinScan()
    Reads incoming messages from the server white the connection isn't closed and executes the specified commands

  • Constructor Details

    • LineClient

      public LineClient(String ip, int port)
      Constructor method with ip and port
      Parameters:
      ip - ip address to connect
      port - port number to connect

  • Method Details

    • startClient

      public void startClient()
      Creates a new a connection socket to the server, creates a new BufferedReader and a PrinterWriter and sets them to the ClientOut and ClientInput. Start the game setup

    • clearConsole

      public static void clearConsole()
      Clears the console and prints player and game information

    • stdinScan

      public static void stdinScan()
      Reads incoming messages from the server white the connection isn't closed and executes the specified commands

    • initSetup

      public static void initSetup()
      Asks to create a new game or join an existing one

    • newGame

      public static void newGame()
      Asks the number of player of the game and sends a message to server to start a new game. If the input value isn't 2 or 3 the default value 2 is chosen

    • joinGame

      public static void joinGame()
      Send a command to the server to join the selected game

    • login

      public static void login() throws IOException
      Asks the player a username Send a command to the server to log in with the selected username
      Throws:
      IOException

    • chooseDeck

      public static void chooseDeck()
      Asks the player to select an assistant cards deck Send a command to the server to select the chosen deck
